title: Now that AMC Theaters has purchased the former Carmike Cinemas on Cinema Drive, do they plan on converting a theater to a large screen format like Mayfaire with IMAX or the new Stone Theaters complex with PDX?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/05/does-the-former-carmike-cinemas-on-cinema-drive-plan-on-converting-a-theater-to-a-large-screen-format/
